references.paper_title: Learning multiple layers of features from tiny images
references.reason: This paper introduces the CIFAR-10 dataset, which is used extensively in the experiments of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Imagenet: A large-scale hierarchical image database
references.reason: This paper introduces the ImageNet dataset, another benchmark dataset used in the current paper's experiments.

references.paper_title: Black-box dataset ownership verification via backdoor watermarking
references.reason: This paper is directly related to the current paper's work on dataset ownership verification, and it is cited multiple times.

references.paper_title: Untargeted backdoor watermark: Towards harmless and stealthy dataset copyright protection
references.reason: This paper is also directly related to the current paper's work and contributes to the background on dataset watermarking techniques.

references.paper_title: Domain watermark: Effective and harmless dataset copyright protection is closed at hand
references.reason: This paper is also directly related to the current paper's work, focusing on dataset watermarking, and is cited multiple times.
